thread.title: Wheeler: Time to get serious about tolls for traffic-busting projects in Portland
thread.title_full: Wheeler: Time to get serious about tolls for traffic-busting projects in Portland

author: Gordon R. Friedman | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Wheeler: Time to get serious about tolls for traffic-busting projects in Portland
text: SALEM -- A group of Oregon mayors say they want legislators to pass a large, statewide transportation funding package that includes money for transit, bike and pedestrian infrastructure. But they acknowledge there won't be enough current sources like bonds, gas taxes and federal funds. So, they say it's time to consider another method: tolling.
